item.title: The little elephant (which fell into the game pit but did not die)
item.summary: A little elephant falls into a game pit. It does not die because the mother elephant pulls it out.
item.comments: 1) See also The little elephant, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-4
item.author: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)

keyword.subkw: -mother pulls her young out of the game pit
